description: Provides information about contact tree, a list of associated contacts with a unique identifier.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description: The identifier of the Amazon Connect instance. You can find the instance ID in the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the instance.

parameters.name: ContactId
parameters.description: The identifier of the contact in this instance of Amazon Connect.

parameters.name: MaxResults
parameters.description: The maximum number of results to return per page. The default MaxResult size is 25. Valid Range: Minimum value of 1. Maximum value of 100.

nested_items.name: ContactSummaryList
nested_items.description: List of the contact summary for all the contacts in contact tree associated with unique identifier.

nested_items.name: ContactId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the contact in this instance of Amazon Connect.

nested_items.name: ContactArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the contact.

nested_items.name: InitiationTimestamp
nested_items.description: The date and time this contact was initiated, in UTC time.

nested_items.name: DisconnectTimestamp
nested_items.description: The date and time that the customer endpoint disconnected from the current contact, in UTC time. In transfer scenarios, the DisconnectTimestamp of the previous contact indicates the date and time when that contact ended.

nested_items.name: InitialContactId
nested_items.description: If this contact is related to other contacts, this is the ID of the initial contact.

nested_items.name: PreviousContactId
nested_items.description: If this contact is not the first contact, this is the ID of the previous contact.

nested_items.name: RelatedContactId
nested_items.description: The contactId that is related to this contact.

nested_items.name: InitiationMethod
nested_items.description: Indicates how the contact was initiated.

nested_items.name: Channel
nested_items.description: How the contact reached your contact center.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: If there are additional results, this is the token for the next set of results.
